abstract: Pres Obama urges law enforcement officials and civil rights activists to work to bridge their differences during four-hour meeting at White House with representatives from both groups; warns that tensions between African-American communities and police will likely worsen in wake of recent events.
snippet: The president, administration officials, police representatives and figures in the Black Lives Matter movement met at the White House, with tensions rising in closed-door sessions....
lead_paragraph: The president, administration officials, police representatives and figures in the Black Lives Matter movement met at the White House, with tensions rising in closed-door sessions.

headline.main: Obama Urges Civil Rights Activists and Police to Bridge Divide
headline.print_headline: Obama Urges Civil Rights Activists and Police to Bridge Divide
